title: Bilgewater rewards not updating properly
body: I'm on act III and its been stuck at 1/2 brawlers wins with new items, 0/4 brawlers hired, and 0/6 wins.  Rito plz.

replies.body:
Hey Cavemantero~

After looking at your match history, it seems that while you did win some games of Black Market Brawler's, you did not buy a Bilgewater item in most of them.

In fact, of the games you won, you only purchased a Bilgewater Item in 1 of them. In the others, you bought Bilgewater items but lost :(

If you win another game with a Bilgewater item, you should proceed through the objective. 

The objectives are achieved sequentially, so when you finish objective 1 you can begin objective 2.

Hope this helps!
ok thanks.  didn't see that part of it.
